thread.title: Putnam Announces Dividend Rates for Class A Open-End Funds

author: cnbc.com
title: Putnam Announces Dividend Rates for Class A Open-End Funds
text:
BOSTON--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The Trustees of The Putnam Funds have declared the following fund distributions.
RECORD/
PAYMENT
FUND NAME AND DISTRIBUTIONS
EX DATE
DATE
Putnam Convertible Securities Fund – Class A Shares (PCONX)
$0.1200 per share investment income 6/27/18 6/29/18 Putnam Dynamic Asset Allocation Balanced Fund – Class A Shares (PABAX)
$0.0620 per share investment income 6/18/18 6/20/18 Putnam Dynamic Asset Allocation Conservative Fund – Class A Shares (PACAX)
$0.0160 per share investment income 6/18/18 6/20/18 Putnam Diversified Income Trust – Class A Shares (PDINX)
$0.0330 per share investment income 6/14/18 6/20/18 Putnam Emerging Markets Income Fund – Class A Shares (PEMWX)
$0.0280 per share investment income 5/23/18 5/25/18 6/21/18 6/25/18 Putnam Equity Income Fund – Class A Shares (PEYAX)
$0.0620 per share investment income 6/27/18 6/29/18 Putnam Fixed Income Absolute Return Fund – Class A Shares (PTRNX)
$0.0280 per share investment income 6/18/18 6/20/18 Putnam Global Income Trust – Class A Shares (PGGIX)
$0.0210 per share investment income 5/23/18 5/30/18 6/25/18 6/29/18 Putnam Global Utilities Fund – Class A Shares (PUGIX)
